title: IFSTA Company Officer 6
description:
The Fire and Emergency Services Company Officer, 6th Edition, Manual provides emergency services personnel with the skills needed to reach the performance requirements of NFPA 1021. This App provides Level I and II Fire Officers and fire officer candidates the tools they need to develop safe, efficient and effective leadership skills, and supports the content provided in our Fire and Emergency Services Company Officer, 6th Edition, Manual. Included FREE in this App is Flashcards and Chapter 1 of the Audiobook and Exam Prep. 

Audiobook: 
Purchase the Fire and Emergency Services Company Officer, 6th Edition, Audiobook through the Companion App. All 16 chapters are narrated in their entirety for 15 hours of content. Features include offline access, bookmarks, and the ability to listen at your own speed. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

Exam Prep:  
Use the 685 IFSTAⓇ-validated Exam Prep questions to confirm your understanding of the content in the Fire and Emergency Services Company Officer, 6th Edition, Manual. The Exam Prep covers all 16 chapters of the Manual. Exam Prep tracks and records your progress, allowing you to review your exams and study your weaknesses. In addition, your missed questions are automatically added to your study deck. This feature requires an in-app purchase. All users have free access to Chapter 1. 

Flashcards: 
Review all 107 key terms and definitions found in all 16 chapters of the Fire and Emergency Services Company Officer, 6th Edition, Manual with Flashcards. This feature is FREE for all users. 

This App covers the following topics: 
1. The Company Officer 
2. Organizational Structure 
3. Leadership and Supervision 
4. Human Resources Management 
5. Communication 
6. Administrative Functions 
7. Occupational Safety, Health, and Wellness 
8. Company-Level Training 
9. Building Construction and Fire Behavior 
10. Company-Level Fire Inspections and Preincident Planning 
11. Delivery of Emergency Services 
12. The Company Officer II 
13. Human Resources Management and Administrative Responsibilities II 
14. Origin and Cause Determination 
15. Delivery of Emergency Services II 
16. Safety Investigations and Analyses
